name: Delinquent accounts, collection
text: §40-82.5  Delinquent accounts, collection.  Any state agency having an account due which is delinquent, may contract with a collection agency bonded under chapter 443B for collection of the delinquent account.  The chairperson or director of the agency may make an agreement with the agency regarding the amount to be retained by it for services. [L 1982, c 88, §1; am L 1990, c 34, §2]
